thread.title: Governor signs bill designed to lower suicide rate of Missouri veterans | State News | columbiamissourian.com
thread.title_full: Governor signs bill designed to lower suicide rate of Missouri veterans | State News | columbiamissourian.com

author: Rebecca Rivas, Missouri Independent
title: Governor signs bill designed to lower suicide rate of Missouri veterans | State News | columbiamissourian.com
text: Gov. Mike Parson signed legislation Thursday to make preventing veteran suicide a top priority for the state agency that aids these residents, the Missouri Veterans Commission. The suicide rate among Missouri’s veterans is nearly double the state rate and one of the highest in the country. kAmp7E6C E9C66 J62CD @7 ECJ:?8[ #6AF3=:42?
